definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

pinyin: Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 zhou1
Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2
Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2 Luo4 shan1 ji1 Fen1 xiao4
containing_words.word: 加利福尼亚大学洛杉矶分校

pinyin: Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 Li3 gong1 Xue2 yuan4

sentences.english: It is selling watermelon juice in California and Oregon.
sentences.chinese: 该公司在加利福尼亚和俄勒冈州出售西瓜汁。

sentences.english: The company is licensed and audited by the California Department of Corporations.
sentences.chinese: 公司由公司的加利福尼亚部门准许并且验核。

sentences.english: She had eaten a hamburger at a California fast-food chain.
sentences.chinese: 她在加利福尼亚的快餐连锁店吃了一个汉堡。

sentences.english: She lives in California. The weather was beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 她住在加利福尼亚，天气很好。

sentences.english: The other effectively allowing same-sex marriage in the state of California.
sentences.chinese: 二是切实有效地允许在加利福尼亚的同性婚姻。

sentences.english: Excuse me while I pack for California.
sentences.chinese: 我要整理行装前往加利福尼亚，不好意思就此打住。

sentences.english: The end of summer in California was still dry and hot.
sentences.chinese: 虽然已是夏末，加利福尼亚的天气依然非常干热。

sentences.english: The race began in Burbank, California, in the middle of the night.
sentences.chinese: 比赛于午夜在加利福尼亚的伯班克开始。

sentences.english: In his opinion, California has the best climate under the sun.
sentences.chinese: 依他看来，世界上要数加利福尼亚的气候最好。

sentences.english: One example is the California condor.
sentences.chinese: 有一个加利福尼亚秃鹫的例子。

sentences.english: Great states like California and Illinois appear about to go belly-up. The U.
sentences.chinese: 像加利福尼亚和伊利诺斯这样的大洲貌似快破产了。

sentences.english: So he called a friend in California to ask for a reference on a responsible hit man.
sentences.chinese: 于是他拜托在加利福尼亚的朋友寻找一个可靠的杀手。

sentences.english: One group is at the Medical Biology Institute in La Lolla, California.
sentences.chinese: 一组是加利福尼亚拉罗拉医学生物研究所。

sentences.english: Norrell, who was adopted from Mexico as a baby by a Californian family, had been in Antioch to attend a rehearsal for a friend's coming-of-age party.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿时的墨西哥女孩诺雷尔被加利福尼亚一家人收养。

sentences.english: He lived in California until he was seventeen.
sentences.chinese: 他在加利福尼亚洲一直住到十七岁。

sentences.english: Angelo's is one of California's hot spot for celebrity.
sentences.chinese: 盎格鲁是加利福尼亚的名人聚集的地方。

pinyin: Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 zhou1
